headline: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Index Ticks Higher as Fed Trims Benchmark Rate
summary: The S&P 500 added 0.7% on Thursday Nov. 7, 2024, as the Fed announced a quarter-point interest-rate cut, in line with market expectations.

headline: EPAM Systems Stock Leads S&P 500 Gains Thursday on Strong Earnings, Outlook
summary: EPAM Systems shares surged Thursday, delivering the top daily performance in the S&P 500 after the company reported earnings that topped estimates and raised its full-year outlook.

raw.headline: EPAM Systems Stock Leads S&P 500 Gains Thursday on Strong Earnings, Outlook

headline: Why EPAM Systems Rallied Today
summary: The IT consultant saw a return to growth.

headline: Software provider EPAM lifts annual forecasts as IT spending rises
summary: EPAM Systems lifted its annual revenue and profit forecasts on Thursday, betting on strong demand for its IT services towards the end of the year as enterprise spending picks up, sending shares of the software provider 11% higher before the bell. More companies are spending on digital transformation and cloud modernization to save costs and improve efficiency. Last month, EPAM acquired the consulting business of Northern Ireland-based FD Technologies for $300.9 million to deepen its expertise in financial services and enhance its artificial intelligence-related capabilities.

headline: Epam: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results exceeded Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of 10 analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $2.70 per share. The information technology services provider posted revenue of $1.17 billion in the period, which also topped Street forecasts.
